column4: after having an initial look around, try going into 'Edit->Preferences' and click on the Plugins tab
srry for the delay. Just trying to work it out ;)
here is an image of what I've done http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/3537/screenshotexternaltoolscs8.png
are you familiar with how sed works ?
the bit that caught me out was the "Input/Output" tabs :)
once your done, it'll be listed under the Tools tab
It's taking forever to execute on a very small document.
When I try to run it, it removes one number at a time...
I added a g to the end of the regexp, and it works fine now. Thanks.
ahh... change the match to this then:    s/[0-9]+/NUMBER/g
